title: runtime: Map comments: Reference on .c file which not exists
body:
https://github.com/golang/go/blob/master/src/runtime/hashmap.go#L106:
```
«Note: the format of the Hmap is encoded in ../../cmd/gc/reflect.c»
```

I've not found reflect.c in current Go source tree. Probably there should be a reference on ../../cmd/internal/gc/reflect.go?
